references.paper_title: A general class of coefficients of divergence of one distribution from another
references.reason: This paper introduces a-divergences, a family of divergence measures that is central to the theoretical framework of the main paper.
This book provides a comprehensive overview of information geometry, which underpins several key concepts and techniques used in the main paper.
This paper's analysis of variance-based regularization is relevant to the main paper's use of f-divergences for regularization.

references.paper_title: Information-type measures of difference of probability distributions and indirect observation
references.reason: This foundational paper provides a comprehensive overview of f-divergences and their properties, which forms the basis for the main paper's theoretical contributions.

references.paper_title: On optimum recognition error and reject tradeoff
references.reason: This seminal paper introduces the concept of classification with rejection, which is the central focus of the main paper.
